nodes.description: GREEK 0101 constitutes one-half of the first year of instruction in Ancient Greek. The course introduces students to grammar and vocabulary with a view to reading original Greek texts. It also aims to help students develop effective study skills and habits that will facilitate readings of Greek prose and poetry in the second year and beyond.

In this course students consolidate their grasp of Greek grammar and develop their skills of comprehension through close reading of selected prose texts, often one or more of the shorter dialogues of Plato.
